Uses of Class
game.movement.FollowBehaviour

Packages that use FollowBehaviour
Package Description
game.movement  

  • Uses of FollowBehaviour in game.movement

    Subclasses of FollowBehaviour in game.movement
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  FollowBirthingSpotBehaviour
    Simulates behaviour of a pregnant DinoActor that needs to lay an egg searching for a spot to lay its egg on.
    class  FollowFoodBehaviour
    Special class that simulates behaviour of a DinoActor moving towards an instance of Food that it can eat.
    class  FollowMateBehaviour
    Special class that simulates behaviour of a DinoActor following another DinoActor to mate with it.
    class  FollowVictimBehaviour
    Special class that simulates behaviour of a DinoActor following another DinoActor to attack it for food.
    class  FollowWaterBehaviour
    Simulates the behaviour of a DinoActor moving toward water when it is thirsty.
